EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Juan,
Thanks for the update. We’ll be sure to touch base again in a few years and see how things are going then.
Regards,
Steve
From: Juan Colina [mailto:jcvcolina@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, January 06, 2012 1:12 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Juan Colina
Hi Steve: I've taken a full time job so I won't be using your services for now. Things may change in a few years.
Sincerely, Juan Colina (215) 203-4744
On Jan 6, 2012, at 12:40 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Hello Juan,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
